Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Requires dental insurance plans to automatically carry over a portion of the enrollee's benefit amount for use in the succeeding year
Summary: Requires dental insurance plans to automatically carry over a portion of the enrollee's unused benefit amount of up to 25% of the total benefit amount for use in the succeeding year.
LawCode: Amd ยง160, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to requiring dental insurance plans to automatically carry over a portion of the enrollee's benefit amount for use in the succeeding year
